channel.title: family on Pseudoyu
channel.description: Recent content in family on Pseudoyu

item.title: Weekly Review #59 - Desert Journey, Family and Kin
item.description: 'Photograph - Ed Sheeran' Preface This piece chronicles my life and reflections from May 1st to May 15th, 2024. During the May Day holiday, I traveled to Inner Mongolia with my family. It wasn’t until we set off that I realized this was the first time we had ventured on a distant journey together. Previously, our furthest excursion had been a drive to Shanghai Disneyland. It was quite a different experience.

item.title: Weekly Review #27 - What Makes a Home
item.description: 'Here After Us - Mayday' Preface This is a record and reflection of my life from 2023-01-16 to 2023-01-22. This week, my time was equally divided between Beijing, Hangzhou, and my hometown in Jiangsu, traveling back and forth. For someone who hasn’t left home for almost three months, the journey brought some fatigue, but I found that I’m not actually averse to such a long-standing change in my life rhythm, and even feel some novelty and anticipation.
